text: LiveLeak was a British video sharing website. It was active from 2006 until 2021. The website was known for having videos that were gory and violent . The site closed on 5 May 2021. The web address was redirected to "itemfix.com". ==References== Category:2006 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2021 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Video sharing websites Category:Websites established in 2006 Category:British entertainment websites
title: LiveLeak
